item.title: Mindsets of Self-learner
item.description: “Picture your brain forming new connections as you meet the challenge and learn. Keep ongoing.” — Carol Dweck Our Thoughts Define Us Thoughts will determine a person’s behaviour. Our mindset will affect our character, habits, behaviour, and attitude, that strongly influenced by the belief system, value system, family values, education, and the environment. Therefore we must ensure that our mindset is only shaped and influenced by right and good values.
